ingredients.ingredient: 1 (16 ounce) container small curd cottage cheese
1 (16 ounce) package frozen phyllo pastry, thawed in refrigerator

cookingTips: Mix cottage cheese, feta, and eggs thoroughly for even distribution
Thaw phyllo in refrigerator overnight, not at room temperature, to prevent sticking
Brush butter between each layer and on top for golden, crispy results
enrichment.coachingPrompt: Explain how to work with delicate phyllo pastry without tearing and why proper thawing matters.
